links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2000
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
prog: (PARI) f(n)= { x=0; for (i=1, n, x=1/(exp(1+n-i) + x)); 1+x } { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 2100); y=1.0; n=70; x=f(n); while(x!=y, y=x; n=n+1; x=f(n);); c=contfrac(x); for (n=1, 2001, write("b055972.txt", n-1, " ", c[n])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, May 03 2009
crossrefs: Cf. A100609 Decimal expansion. - _Harry J. Smith_, May 03 2009
author: _Leroy Quet_, Jul 19 2000
